project_plan.name: Weather Fetcher Application in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that retrieves current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Research and select a public API for weather information
Implement a function to fetch weather data from the API
Parse the fetched data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement command-line input for the user to specify a city
Display the fetched weather information (temperature, humidity, and conditions) in the terminal
Write tests for each of the implemented features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
